title: When You See Three Low Enemies Bot As Katarina

replies.body: And the triple is literally handed to you with the motion of three fingers while you do homework, sip your tea, and post on the boards about how Katarina is balanced all at the same time.

I was playing with my lvl 1 brother in an intermediate bot game a few days ago as kat. he was running away from 4 bots on bot lane with 10% health.

for some reason when i got there they were all stacked on top of each other so tight that i shunpo'ed the middle and hit them all with my W.

they made it about 2 seconds. only because death lotus hits a max of 3 champs. it was a slaughter.

Yea the bot AI has taken a really disappointing turn. They chase you from the middle of their base to your tier two tower and then just stand there and twitch a little bit. Or they go too deep, get collapsed on by two+ people and then just stand there twitching until you kill them. At this point I just want Doom Bots back for something that is actually worth playing.
